Name: Fowl
SeedDescription: Plant these in spring. Takes 9 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 봄 또는 여름 작물. 성장하려면 8일이 소요됩니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter au printemps. Prend 9 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket tavasszal, vagy nyáron ültesse el. 8 napig tart megérniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante isso na primavera. Leva 9 dias para amadurecer.
